description:
Retention of single storey brick built side and rear extension to existing car repair
 Workshop to provide covered parking for storage of vehicles
decision_conditions: The car parking spaces shown on the approved plan C01.194.01A, shall be used for storage of cars only and no work including maintenance and repairs, shall be carried out on vehicles except for within the existing workshop building.    REASON: To ensure there is adequate provision for storage of cars within the site and in the interests of the living conditions of nearby occupiers in accordance with adopted UDP policy T31, T58, B5, B8 and ES5 and replacement UDP policy 9.1, 9.11, 4.1 and 4.11. | No vehicles in control of the applicant shall park or be worked upon within a 2 miles radius of the site.  REASON: In the interests of highway safety and to protect the living conditions of nearby residents in accordance with adopted UDP policy T9, B5 and ES5 and replacement policy 9.1, 9.11, 7.8 and 4.11. | Any machinery audible outside the premises must be designed to an acoustic standard not exceeding Noise Rating NR35 measured or calculated at the nearest horizontal or vertical boundary of the nearest affected dwelling, whichever is the closer.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers in accordance with adopted UDP policy B5, B8 and ES5 and replacement UDP policy 4.1 and 4.11.
